Text:
Merry Xmas ! 

finally we got 3.2.5  but right in the time they made it to 3.2.6 lol

.2.6 - 24th Dec 2010
- Fixed Fraps not able to initialize DirectX on startup for some people
- Fixed crash while recording that could cause video to be written incompletely
- Fixed rare bug causing graphic corruption of individual frames in recorded movies
- Fixed crash on Windows 2000 machines

hope we will get it before the eve  of 2011 lol

IN 3.2.6 

"Fixed Fraps not able to initialize DirectX on startup for some people"

This happens for me D:! so i cant use fraps :(

Hellboy please try and get a 3.2.6 fraps upload i would be grateful :D

sorry for  my prev post , my keys got fucked up ( and its a microsoft product ) 

we been waiting for so long for this 3/2/5 release nad when we finally got it  , beepa managed to release  a new build 3/2/6 with some bug fixed
